section.p: ‘Well, tell you what - I’ll teach you a few tricks, and then you can go away. What do you say?’

You’ve got nothing to lose so you accept. Damor was once a Troubadour, and he instructs you in its arts. Gain 1 CHARISMA point permanently. Afterwards, for a few hours, he lifts the curse that soured your water so you can make it down the mountain path safely. .
